quest.name: Back to Baskets
journal: Mogson looks like he's forgotten something again.
It appears that the absent-minded Mogson has left his baskets behind again, this time in Tharl Oom Khash. Recover them for the poor moogle so he can stop fluttering about in distress.

You find the baskets scattered around Tharl Oom Khash, and it is a mystery how the tiny moogle expected to carry them back in the first place. Return to Mogson and deliver his precious baskets back to him.

Mogson is delighted to have the baskets returned to him, grateful that he can resume crafting with the crystals stored inside the baskets. It seems that a distant dragon's roar scared the moogle off while he was gathering the crystals. Now, thanks to you, the nervous moogle can resume crafting whatever it is he makes.

dialogue.name: MOGSON
dialogue.text: Oh no, I've done it again, kupo. I've forgotten my baskets! Please, adventurer, find them for me!

dialogue.name: MOGSON
dialogue.text: I forgot three baskets around Tharl Oom Khash. Find them before the monsters get into them!

dialogue.name: MOGSON
dialogue.text: Those baskets are precious to me. Find them around Tharl Oom Khash, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOGSON
dialogue.text: If I don't get those baskets back, this whole day will have been a waste, kupo! Were you able to recover them?

dialogue.name: MOGSON
dialogue.text: My baskets! Thank heavens you found them, kupo!

dialogue.name: MOGSON
dialogue.text: I went to Tharl Oom Khash to gather crystals for my crafting, but then I heard a dragon roar in the distance and ran off, leaving my baskets behind, kupo!
